fullplot: When a gang of masked, ax-wielding murderers descend upon the Davison family reunion, the hapless victims seem trapped... until an unlikely guest of the family proves to be the most talented killer of all.
plot: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.
title: You're Next

tomatoes.consensus: You're Next's energetic and effective mix of brutal gore and pitch black humor will please horror buffs and beyond.
